channel.title: 한반지 영화 예고편 2차 처리장
channel.description: 영어공부 삼아 올리는 것이오니 참고용으로 봐주세요. 자막이 안 나올 경우 플레이어 오른쪽 하단의 자막(CC) 버튼을 눌러주세요. 자막 색깔, 폰트 등도 취향에 맞게 변경하시면 설정이 계속 유지됩니다. 프로필을 읽어주세요.

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 블루 자스민 공식 예고편 (한국어 자막)
item.description: So what do you think?I love it!You shouldn't spoil me so.Oh, why not?Who else am I going to spoil?He met me at a party and swept me off my feet.I fell in love with the name Jasmine.You know, I've never been to San Francisco.I'll be staying with my sister.Jasmine!Oh, my God!Look at you!Your place is homey.Well, the flight was bumpy, the food was awful, and you'd think first class...I thought you were tapped out.I'm dead broke.Really, I mean the government took everything.All I can say is you look great.Oh, now who's lying?Is there anything you want that you don't have?Sweetheart, it's beautif.......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 잡스 공식 예고편 (한국어 자막)
item.description: "누구는 가능한 대상을 본다. 누구는 가능한 대상을 바꾼다."영화 평도 그리 좋지 않고, 스티브 워즈니악이 사실과 다르다고 지적도 했고, 스티브 잡스를 너무 미화시키지 않았나 하는 반감도 들지만, 어쨌든 컴퓨터 역사에서 중요한 인물인 건 사실이죠. • 음악:Macklemore & Ryan Lewis의 'Can't Hold Us' 여기Steve!It takes guts to drop out like you did.Higher education comes at the expense of experience.Woz!What are you working on?It's a computer terminal that hooks up to the TV for the display.Steve?These are state-of-the-art.Nobody's making anything like this.Welcome to Apple Computer.Is this everyth.......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 터치 필리 공식 예고편 (한국어 자막)
item.description: 어느 마사지 치료사가 갑자기 신체 접촉을 혐오하게 되면서 생기는 이야기라는데요. 여류 감독 린 쉘튼의 작품입니다.• 음악:Grand Hallway의 'Horses' 여기I'm gonna spray some rose water, okay?Take a deep breath. Abby, will you marry me?What's up?Paul, how's the practice doing?Great.Who's next?No one today.A calzone is not the same as a Hot Pocket.*I'm gonna prove you wrong and you're gonna owe me.How's the apartment search?You found something?Not yet.Why don't you just move in with me?What time's your first victim?Oh, ten minutes ago.Due to some unforeseen circumstances, I will not be seeing cli.......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 이스케이프 플랜 공식 예고편 (한국어 자막)
item.description: "혼자 탈옥할 수는 없다"두 분이 전성기 때 공연했다면 하는 아쉬움이 생기지만... 근데 예고편이 너무 자세히 보여주는 듯 하네요. The mind of a man confined works differently than someone on the outside.He sees things in a different way.A success for a break out depends on three things: knowing the layout, understanding the routine, and help from outside or in.We've got a runner.Put your hands in the air now!Showtime.Ray Breslin is able to break out of any prison designed by man.We're testing a prototype facility to deal with people no government wants on their books.The people financing this need .......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 돈 존 공식 예고편 (한국어 자막)
item.description: "해피엔딩이 인생의 전부는 아니다."조셉 고든-레빗의 첫 각본 및 감독작입니다. 주제가 저로서는 공감이 잘...^^ • 음악:Marky Mark (마크 월버그) and the Funky Bunch의 'Good Vibrations' 여기There's only a few things I really care about in life: my body, my pad, my ride, my family, my church, my boys, my girls and my porn.*My body, my pad, my ride, my family, my church, my boys, my girls, my porn.Body, pad, ride, family, church, boys, girl...That's her?That's definitely her!She's a dime!This girl's more than a dime.Oh, my God!What, are you in love with this girl already?You should have seen thi.......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 2 건스 공식 예고편 (한국어 자막)
item.description: 동명의 그래픽 노블을 영화화한 것으로, 아이슬란드 출신의 발타자르 코루마쿠르 감독이 전작 <콘트라밴드 (Contraband)>에 이어 마크 월버그와 함께 작업합니다. • 음악:Devlin의 'Watchtower' 여기You've ever heard the saying, "Never rob a bank across from a diner that has the best doughnuts in three counties."?That's not a saying.Yes, it is.No, it's not.I get what you're saying.You never heard it.Maybe you never heard.But it's not a saying.It's a saying.Okay.It's a saying now.Everybody, sit down on the floor.Fire in the hole!How much do you figure?40 million.40 million dollars?But I got ba.......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 호빗: 스마우그의 폐허 공식 예고편 (한국어 자막)
item.description: 2부와 3부를 어떻게 나눌지가 궁금하네요. 정말 얇은 책인데... • 음악:Audiomachine의 'Age of Dragons' 여기Where does your journey end?You seek that which would bestow upon you the right to rule.The quest to reclaim a homeland and slay a dragon.Do not think I will not kill you, Dwarf.When did we allow evil to become stronger than us?It is not our fight.It is our fight.What if it's a trap?It is undoubtedly a trap.Such is the nature of evil.In time all foul things come forth.If you awaken that beast, you will destroy us all.Was that an earthquake?That, my lad, was a dragon.• 원제: The H.......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 더 패밀리 공식 예고편 (한국어 자막)
item.description: "누구는 범죄조직, 또 누구는 가족이라고 부른다."동료들을 밀고하고 FBI에 의해 프랑스에 은신한 마피아 가족 이야기입니다. 몰락한 대부를 보는 듯 한 게, 로버트 드니로가 제격인 거 같네요. • 음악:1. The Rolling Stones의 'Can't You Hear Me Knocking' 여기2. Elbow의 'Grounds for Divorce' 여기3. Muse의 'Feeling Good' 여기There was a time when I had it all.People would ask me, "What was it like being untouchable?"The question they really should have asked was, "What happens when it's all over?"You set a good example by snitching on your friends in the mob.We're not in Brooklyn anymore.I don't think .......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 오직 신만이 용서한다 ⑲ 공식 예고편들 (한국어 자막)
item.description: "악마를 만날 때다"<드라이브>로 호평을 받은 니콜라스 윈딩 레픈 감독과 라이언 고슬링의 신작인데, 이번 칸 영화제에서 평이 그닥 안 좋았죠. I know it's hard for you emotionally.Your brother was murdered.When?Yesterday.Did you get the guy who did it?It's more complicated than that, mother.Meaning what exactly?You can't go around killing cops anymore.If the tables were turned, your brother would find your killer and brought me his head on a platter!*Here's coming after me next.Please Julian, protect me.I'm just here for him.That was not what she said.What does she say?Kill them all.I have a .......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 버틀러 공식 예고편 (한국어 자막)
item.description: "한 조용한 목소리가 혁명을 점화시킬 수도 있다"1952년부터 86년까지 여덟 명의 대통령의 시중을 든 Eugene Allen의 이야기를 바탕으로 한 것인데, 너무 많이 각색해서인지 주인공 이름도 Cecil Gaines로 바꿔버렸네요.Are you political, Mr. Gaines?No, Sir.Good.We have no tolerance for politics at the White House.I'm Cecil Gaines.I'm the new butler.You hear nothing, you see nothing.You only serve.You know he got that job himself.The white house called him.He didn't call the White House.I wanna hear all the stories.I don't know how many stories you're gonna hear because they done swore him to some kind of sec.......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 인시디어스 제2장 공식 예고편 (한국어 자막)
item.description: "당신이 가장 사랑하는 걸 잡아갈 것이다."제임스 완 감독이 직접 속편을 만든다니 아직 할 얘기가 많은가보군요. • 전편:공식 예고편 보기.• 음악:Tiny Tim의 'Tiptoe Through the Tulips' 여기I'm gonna be at grandma's house for a little bit.Good night.Good night.Nothing is gonna bother us, not anymore.We have our son back.We are a family again.Sally!It's still happening.What is?Tell us.What does she want?*I heard voices in the hallway.Is there something wrong with daddy, mom?Whatever it was that was haunting my family, it's not done with us.I know what happened.I went into that place to get .......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 엘리시움 2차 예고편 추가
item.description: 전에 예고편에 비해 설정 등을 좀더 자세히 보여주고 있네요. 여기

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 플레인 공식 예고편들 (한국어 자막)
item.description: 디즈니 스튜디오가 픽사의 카 프랜차이즈를 물려받아(?) 제작 중인데요. 유튜브 보면 커밍 순 배, 기차, 오토바이, 잠수함, 탱크, 우주선 등, 돈독이 오른 디즈니를 조롱하는 댓글이 많네요.^^ • 음악:1. White Zombie의 'More Human than Human' 여기2. Electric Light Orchestra의 'Don't Bring Me Down' 여기Welcome to the world's fastest sport!Where only the best of the best compete.Oh, for flying out loud!For the first time we have a crop duster in the race.Well, he's gonna die.Dusty, you're going up against the best racers in the world.I'm afraid of heights!That airplane need some help.You all know tha.......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 월즈 엔드 공식 예고편 (한국어 자막)
item.description: "하룻밤. 여섯 친구. 열두 술집. 전멸."<This is the End>와 더불어 제가 기대하는 코미디 영화입니다.^^ <뜨거운 녀석들 (Hot Fuzz)>이 국내 개봉 했었으니, 이것도... • 음악:1. The Soup Dragons의 'I'm Free' 여기2. Lil Jon의 'Drink' 여기3. Nero의 'Doomsday' 여기And we'll be back just like the 5 musketeers.3 musketeers, isn't it?Nobody knows how many there were really, do they?Do you know that The 3 Musketeers is a fiction, right?Written by Alexandre Dumas.A lot of people are saying that about the Bible these days.What?That was written by Alexandre Dumas?Don't be dumb, Steven.It was .......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 리딕 공식 예고편 (한국어 자막)
item.description: "어둠을 지배하라"꽤 많은 제작비가 들어갔지만 흥행엔 실패한 2편 <리딕 연대기 (The Chronicles of Riddick, 국내제목: 리딕: 헬리온 최후의 빛)>에 비해, 다시 1편 <피치 블랙 (Pitch Black, 국내제목: 에이리언 2020)>처럼 저예산, 작은 규모로 제작한다죠. • 전편:'리딕 연대기 (The Chronicles of Riddick)' 공식 예고편 보기.I don't know how many times I've been crossed off the list and left for dead.So this... this ain't nothin' new.Bounty hunters.I've been hunting Riddick for ten years.He's the most dangerous man we've ever tracked.Bounty's been doubled.I've come to collect your head in a.......

item.author: eaofthering

item.description: 카이주들도 나름 무슨 능력이 있나보네요. 여기

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 그래비티 공식 예고편 (한국어 자막)
item.description: 어릴 때 우주미아가 되면 어떨까 상상하곤 했는데 이를 다룬 영화가 나오는군요. 구출 되겠죠? • 음악:Arvo Pärt의 'Spiegel im Spiegel' 여기Beautiful, don't you think?What?The sunrise.Terrific.No!Houston, Dr. Stone is off structure!Listen to my voice!You need to focus!I can't!I'm losing visual of you.I'm spinning!I can't breathe!Grab ahold, grab anything!What do I do?What do I do?No, no, no...Anybody, please copy...• 원제: Gravity• 북미 개봉일: 2013년 10월 4일• 한국 개봉일: 미정

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 엔더의 게임 공식 예고편 (한국어 자막)
item.description: 1985년에 발표된 Orson Scott Card의 동명의 소설을 원작으로 합니다. <휴고>의 두 배우가 또 공연하는군요. • 음악:Hi-Finesse의 'Opus' 여기They know our strategies.They've learned our weaknesses.And the alien attack nearly destroyed us.That must never be allowed to happen again.If we're going to survive, we need a new kind of soldier.One who doesn't think the way we think, fear the things we fear.One the enemy would never expect.We need minds like yours, Ender.You'll be the finest commander we've ever trained.So, I'm not the first.No.But you will be the last.I'll do everything I can to.......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 화이트 하우스 다운 2차 예고편 추가
item.description: 저번 긴 티저 예고편은 분위기가 많이 진지했는데, 이번 예고편은 그때의 진지함을 좀 던 거 같네요. 여기

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: R.I.P.D. 공식 예고편 (한국어 자막)
item.description: "산 자들을 보호하고 돕는다"유튜브 댓글을 보면 고스트 바스터즈와 맨인블랙이 짬뽕된 거 같다는 평이 많은데요. 동명의 코믹을 원작으로 합니다. Police officer!Tough day.Where am I?You're dead.This is a joke.Hilarious.You have skills that we want.We'd like you to join the R.I.P.D..The R.I.P.D.?Rest In Peace Department.I think you're smellin' what I'm sellin'.*Your job is catching deados, the bad souls that escape judgment.Meet your new partner.No!You got to earn that.C'mon.We are the greatest lawmen that ever lived and died.Now, some souls hide out among the living.Damn, I don't know what eyes I s.......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 블링 링 공식 예고편들 (한국어 자막)
item.description: 2008-9년 약 1년간 헐리우드 스타들 집을 털어 약 3백만 달러치의 재산피해를 입힌, 겁없는 십대들 일당 '블링 링'을 다룬 작품입니다 • 음악:Sleigh Bells의 'Crown on the Ground' 여기Girls!Time for your Adderall!*We know.That's my homie, Marc.Hey.Hi, I'm Nicki, this is Sam.Hi.Oh, my God, there's Paris Hilton!It's Kirsten Dunst.I just think we wanted to be a part of, like, the lifestyle.The lifestyle that everybody kind of wants.Paris Hilton's hosting a party in Vegas tonight.Where does she live?Do you think we can find a way in?I don't know.C'mon, let's go to Paris's.I wanna rob.Awesome!Oh, my.......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 토르: 다크 월드 공식 예고편 (한국어 자막)
item.description: 부제에 아예 다크를 박은 걸 보니 정말 다크해지려 작정했나보네요. 전작보다 낫기를 바랍니다. • 전편:전편 공식 예고편 보기.• 음악:Audiomachine의 'Helios' 여기Some believe that before the universe, there was nothing.They're wrong.There was darkness, and it has survived.I gave you my word, I would return.What's gonna happen?Hold on.Wait, what?Jane!We're from different worlds.Maybe they're separate for a reason.If we do nothing, they will destroy us.Ask yourself: What will you sacrifice for what you believe?No!You must be truly desperate to come to me for help.You should know when you .......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 러쉬 공식 예고편들 (한국어 자막)
item.description: "누구든 무언가가 이끈다."70년대 포뮬라 원 선수 니키 라우다와 제임스 헌트의 라이벌 관계를 그린 작품인데요. 예고편만 봐서는 <뷰티풀 마인드> 때처럼 제임스 헌트의 부부관계를 너무 미화시키지 않을까 의구심이 드네요. 2차 예고편 (5월 25일 추가) There's a lie that all drivers tell themselves.Death is something that happens to other people.That's how you find the courage to get in the car in the first place.But more powerful than fear itself is the will to win.Who's that?It's Niki Lauda.He's just been signed by Ferrari.Showdown between you and Niki is all anyone wants to see.Why don't they mak.......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 비포 미드나잇 공식 예고편 (한국어 자막)
item.description: 1995년 <비포 선라이즈 (Before Sunrise)>, 2004년 <비포 선셋 (Before Sunset)>의 속편입니다. 아아 세월이여...전 제작 소식도 몰랐는데, 어느 분의 신청으로 알게 되었네요. • 전편:'비포 선셋 (Before Sunset)' 공식 예고편 보기.• 음악:Χάρις Αλεξίου (Haris Alexiou)의 'Για ένα Tango (Everything for a Tango)' 여기Uh, we said we were gonna stop.They wanted to see the ruins.Yeah, but should we wake them up?I don't know.You know, let's do... on our way back to the airport we can catch it.You don't really want to.Yeah, I'm probably not.Okay.And how did .......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 이건 종말이다 ⑲ 공식 예고편들 (한국어 자막)
item.description: 작년 요맘 때의 <The Watch>가 연상되기도 하는데요. 배우들이 실제 자기 이름으로 출연합니다. Seth!I put the best weekend plan.James Franco's having a giant party.Yes!This place is beautiful, man.This place is like a piece of me.You two just stepped inside of me.You let us both come inside you.Yeah!Boom!Thanks, James Franco.Have you seen Michael Cera tonight?What's up, Rihanna?I can't believe people still invite him places.Don't touch my bum, bitch!He has such a weird face.Oh, so hot.What the...Seth, come on!Get in the house!Craig!It's too late for you, you're already in the hole!Kevin!Get .......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 론 레인저 3차 예고편 추가
item.description: 전 이번에 조사(?)하면서 알았는데... 론 레인저와 여기 처음에 나오는 여인의 관계가 생각보다 복잡하더군요. 근데 예고편에선 자세히 안 알려주네요. 여기

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 헝거 게임: 캣칭 파이어 공식 예고편 (한국어 자막)
item.description: "모든 혁명은 불꽃 하나로 시작된다" • 음악:T.T.L.의 'Beyond Fire' 여기Ladies and gentlemen, the victors of the 74th Hunger Games, Katniss Everdeen and Peeta Mellark!She's not who they think she is.She just wants to save her skin, simple as that.She has become a beacon of hope for them.She has to be eliminated.What do you think?I agree she should die, but in the right way, at the right time.Katniss Everdeen is a symbol.We don't have to destroy her, just her image.Show them that she's one of us now.Let them rally behind that.They're gonna hate her so much, they just might kill her for yo.......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 맨 오브 스틸 3차 예고편 추가

item.title: 스타 트렉: 다크니스 3차 예고편 추가
item.description: 엔터프라이즈호가 저렇게 가라앉는 걸까요? 너무 많이 보여준 거 같은데.예전 프로메테우스 때처럼 페이크일 수도 있겠죠. 뭐. 여기

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 엘리시움 공식 예고편들 (한국어 자막)
item.description: 올여름은 SF물 홍수네요. 2차 예고편 (6월 16일 추가) Max De Costa, 36 years old.Violation today at bus stop 34B.What's in the bag?Hair products, mostly.I'm just... hey, hey, hey, hey!Just going to work!Thank you, citizen.No, thank you.Immediate extension of probation by further 8 months.Wait, what?No, no, no.No.Elevation in heart rate detected.Would you like a pill?No, I am okay, thank you.Are you being sarcastic and/or abusive?Negative.Welcome.Hello, madam.Cancer cells removed.3 undocumented ships are approaching Elysium air space.Shoot them down.I see that things haven't changed.This was.......

item.description: 이번 예고편에서야 주인공 워렌 부부가 등장하네요. 여기

item.description: 예고편이 OST 광고 같네요. 특히 I can see the green light. I can see it in your eye. 하는 부분은 화면이랑 어우러져 황홀한 느낌이 드네요. 여기

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 캐리 2차 예고편 추가
item.description: 76년작을 생각하면 나올 수 없는 대사가 중간에 나오는데요... 어떻게 각색했는지 궁금해지네요. 여기

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 터보 공식 예고편들 (한국어 자막)
item.description: "그는 빠르다. 저들은 격렬하다" 3차 예고편 (7월 9일에 추가) • 음악:1. Cake의 'The Distance' 여기2. Foster the People의 'Don't Stop (Color on the Walls)' 여기3. Survivor의 'Eye of the Tiger' 여기 4. The Heavy의 'How You Like Me Now?' 여기My name is Turbo.I just wanna go a little faster.Yes!Seventeen minutes.That's a new record!You are a snail.Quit it with the speed stuff.Start living your life.Morning, Phil!Morning...I have a life?I wish, I wish I was fast.Oh, no.What's happening to me?Little far from home, aren't you?Garden snail.Go!Look.He's dead.Oh, you got fancy magic supe.......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 이스트 공식 예고편들 (한국어 자막)
item.description: "우릴 염탐해봐. 그쪽을 염탐할 테니."올해 선댄스 영화제 때 공개됐었는데, 꽤 평을 좋더군요. 2차 예고편 (5월 3일 추가) • 음악:Civil Twilight의 'Letters from the Sky' 여기Another corporate figure has been targeted by the eco-activist group, The East.We need someone to get inside The East.Who would you choose?Me.I'm unexpected.Being unexpected is the only advantage that matters.Robert McCabe called me himself.In one month's time, I want to know the identities of every person who poisoned his company.I'm looking for The East tag.I heard The East doesn't exists.Who is she?Welcome to The East,.......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 화이트 하우스 다운 공식 예고편들 (한국어 자막)
item.description: 백악관 파괴 전문감독의 최신작입니다. 2차 예고편 (5월 5일 추가) • 음악:Led Zeppelin의 'Black Dog (Teriszega Drumstep Remix)' 여기Hey, can I show you something?These are White House passes.Your dad has a job interview with the Secret Service.*No way!It's really cool.John Cale.Why do you wanna be in the Secret Service?I can't think of a more important job than protecting the President.In college you barely maintained a C average.You do not look at Agent Todd.Special Agent Todd keeps making those sounds, I'll start looking at him.Did you get the job?Yeah, I think I got a shot.You know h.......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 울버린 공식 예고편들 (한국어 자막)
item.description: 올해 블록버스터 영화치고 예고편이 상당히 늦게 공개 됐는데요. 일본이 배경이라서 그런가... 저로서는 좀 뭔가 저렴해 보이는군요. 2차 예고편 (5월 22일 추가) • 음악:Groove Addicts의 'Still Water' 여기Wake up.Where were you?Oh, Jean.I am so sorry.I'll never hurt you, or anyone ever again.It's too late.No!Jean!You can't hide...No, Jean, no!I've been trying to find the Wolverine for over a year.It's not who I am anymore.My employer wants to say thank you for saving his life all those years ago.Run, now!There was a time when our enemies knew honor.I wanted to offer you something no one else .......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 투 더 원더 공식 예고편 (한국어 자막)
item.description: • 음악:Andy Quin의 'Awakening' 여기My sweet love.My hope.You're everything to me.Speak with him.Love is not only a feeling, love is a duty.To commit yourself is to run the risk of failure, a risk of betrayal.But the man who makes a mistake can repent.You fear your love has died; it perhaps is waiting to be transformed into something higher.Here I am.Do you know what you want?Awaken the love which sleeps in each man, each woman.Know each other in that love that never changes.I love you forever. • 원제: To the Wonder• 북미 개봉일: 2013년 4월 12일• 한국 개봉일: 미정.......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 킥애스 2 ⑲ 공식 예고편들 (한국어 자막)
item.description: 날렵했던 힛걸이 많이 큰 게 좀 아쉽지만, 어쨌든 기대되는군요.(4월 13일에 추가) • 음악:1. Sleigh Bells의 'Infinity Guitars' 여기2. Caspa의 'War' 여기 3. '드레드 (Dredd)' OST의 'Mega City One' 여기 Ready to go again?What do you want me to do?Hit me.You're a 15-year-old...What the hell?Act like a bitch, get slapped like a bitch!Oh, god...Oh take your tampon out, Dave.They may wear costumes, but it isn't Halloween.They're real-life superheroes.Me and Hit-Girl?We were training every day.There were more and more people joining us every night.Colonel Stars and Stripes, reporting for duty........

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 헛소동 공식 예고편 (한국어 자막)
item.description: <어벤져스> 감독 조스 위던이 셰익스피어 작품을 현대적으로 각색한 것인데요. 촬영은 그의 저택에서 약 반달 동안 했다고 합니다. • 원작:'헛소동 (Much Ado About Nothing)' 1993년작 예고편 보기.• 음악:St. Germain의 'Rose Rouge' 여기Well, niece, I hope to see you one day fitted with a husband.Not till God make men of some other metal than earth.It is certain I am lov'd of all ladies, but truly I love none.A dear happiness to women.O God, sir, I cannot endure my Lady Tongue.There's a kind of merry war betwixt Signior Benedick and her.*They never meet, but there's a skirmish of wit betw.......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 애프터 어스 공식 예고편들 (한국어 자막)
item.description: "위험은 실재해. 두려움은 하나의 선택이야"윌 스미스 부자 얼굴이 참 많이 닮았군요. 샤말란 감독이 이 영화로 명예회복을 하시면 좋겠네요. • 음악:1. Michael McCann의 'Main Menu' 여기2. Michael McCann의 'Icarus' 여기In the field you are emotionally unpredictable.You confuse courage with recklessness.I am not advancing you.You have a son that you do not know.He's reaching for you and he does not need a commanding officer.He needs a father.Now go make some good memories together.Crash landed.Two confirmed survivors.Do you know where we are?No, sir.This is earth.There's some emergency beacon in.......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 행오버 3부 ⑲ 공식 예고편들 (한국어 자막)
item.description: "끝."1편은 국내개봉 못하고, 2편은 총 관객수가 6만명 정도던데, 이번 마지막편이 개봉할 수 있을지 모르겠군요. 2차 예고편 (4월 21일에 추가) • 음악:1. Wolfmother의 'Apple Tree' 여기2. R. Kellys의 'I Believe I Can Fly' 여기I can't believe my daddy is dead.I can think of so many people I would rather have died first like my mother.Apparently Alan has been off meds for about six months.Oh, god.Look at him now.We're all here to tell you about an awesome place called New Horizons.It does sound awesome.Alan, this is an intervention.We'll drive you there today and I promise you will come back a .......

item.description: 최근 포스터 때문에 짐작되긴 했지만, 막판에 아이언맨 군단이... 여기

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 컨저링 공식 예고편들 (한국어 자막)
item.description: 1950년대 paranormal investigator 혹은 유령사냥꾼(ghost hunter) 팀인 워렌 부부의 사건파일을 바탕으로 했다는군요 2차 예고편 (4월 10일에 추가) • 음악:Donovan의 'Hurdy﻿ Gurdy Man' 여기 It's 9:18, we had downed to the cellar where the door's just opened by its own.Give us a sign that you wanna communicate with us.Nothing.What are you guys?Well, we've been called ghost hunters, paranormal researchers.But we prefer to be known simply as Ed and Lorraine Warren.Here, someone here would like to talk to you.There's something horrible happening in my house.Dad!It's November 1, 1971.I'm.......

item.author: eaofthering
item.title: 하늘에서 음식이 내린다면 2 공식 예고편들 (한국어 자막)
item.description: "엄청난 게 찌꺼기로 남아있었다"원작이 있었던 전편과 달리, 이번 편은 캐릭터 등만 빌려온 것인데 잘 나올지 모르겠군요.예고편에서도 영어단어를 이용한 말장난이 많이 나오는데, 본편 번역하실 분은 고생 좀 하실듯 합니다.^^ 2차 예고편 (7월 7일에 추가) Flint?Sam, big news.I'm going back to Swallow Falls to destroy the FLDSMDFR, which is creating deadly food monsters who are trying to learn to swim so they can attack the lady Liberty!*I'm coming.What?Wait!Sam, it's gonna be deadly dangerous with a good chance of death.And that's why we'll need help.When we land at Swallow Falls, our first object.......
